item.title: Twitch reinstates Trump’s account ahead of the 2024 presidential election
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description:
Prior to the ban, Trump's team used his channel to broadcast some of his campaigns. With the ban now lifted, his channel can resume doing so.

item.title: Faulty CrowdStrike update causes major global IT outage, taking out banks, airlines and businesses globally
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
Security giant CrowdStrike said the outage was not caused by a cyberattack, as businesses anticipate widespread disruption.

item.title: CrowdStrike outage: How your plane, train and automobile travel may be affected
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan, Kirsten Korosec
item.description:
The CrowdStrike outage that hit early Friday morning and knocked out computers running Microsoft Windows has grounded flights globally. Major U.S. airlines including United Airlines, American Airlines and Delta Air Lines have halted flight operations around the world. According to FlightAware, which is tracking the cancellations live, 7% of United Airlines flights, 8% of American […]

item.title: M&A activity heats up with Wiz, Graphcore, etc.
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description:
This week, Google is in discussions to pay $23 billion for cloud security startup Wiz, SoftBank acquires Graphcore, and more.

item.title: CrowdStrike’s rivals stand to benefit from its update fail debacle
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
CrowdStrike competes with a number of vendors, including SentinelOne and Palo Alto Networks but also Microsoft, Trellix, Trend Micro and Sophos, in the endpoint security market.

item.title: CrowdStrike chaos leads to grounded aircraft — and maybe an unusual weather effect
item.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
item.description:
The IT outage may have an unexpected effect on the climate: clearer skies and maybe lower temperatures this evening

item.title: The CrowdStrike outage is a plot point in a rom-com
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description:
There’s a man in Florida right now who wants to propose to his girlfriend while they’re on a beach vacation. He couldn’t get the engagement ring before he flew down from New England, but it didn’t seem like that big of an issue — his girlfriend’s daughter Nicole was planning to join them in Florida […]

Here's everything you need to know so far about the global outages caused by CrowdStrike's buggy software update.

item.title: TechCrunch Minute: OpenAI shrinks its flagship model
item.dc:creator: Anthony Ha
item.description:
OpenAI is launching a mini version of its latest AI model. These small AI models are meant to be faster and more affordable than the full version — making them particularly useful for simple, high-volume tasks. That should appeal to smaller developers who don’t necessarily have a lot of money for AI costs but want […]

item.title: From the Sphere to false cyberattack claims, misinformation runs rampant amid CrowdStrike outage
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description:
This serves as an example for how easy it is to spread inaccurate information online during a time of immense global confusion and panic.

item.title: Paytm loss widens and revenue shrinks as it grapples with regulatory clampdown
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
Indian fintech Paytm’s struggles won’t seem to end. The company on Friday reported that its revenue declined by 36% and its loss more than doubled in the first quarter as it continues to grapple with a regulatory clampdown that has significantly curtailed business at its payments bank subsidiary.  Once the poster child of India’s startup […]

item.title: Fandango founder dies in fall from Manhattan skyscraper
item.dc:creator: Maxwell Zeff
item.description:
J. Michael Cline, the co-founder of Fandango and multiple other startups over his multi-decade career, died after falling from a Manhattan hotel, New York’s Deputy Commissioner of Public Information tells TechCrunch. The New York Police Department responded to 911 calls from the Kimberly Hotel, a 30-story hotel on 50th street in midtown Manhattan on Tuesday […]

The list includes behind-the-scenes footage of the 2024 NBA All-Star Weekend, an immersive performance by The Weeknd, new series, films, concerts and more. The headset launched in February with more than 150 3D movies and immersive titles. Apple is adding […]

item.description:

item.title: Why it made sense for an online community college to raise venture capital
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
item.description:
When Tade Oyerinde first set out to fundraise for his startup, Campus, a fully accredited online community college, it was incredibly difficult. VCs have backed for-profit education companies in the past, including Coursera and Udacity, but backing a more traditional two-year college is different. Plus, he was looking for funds a few years ago when […]

item.title: PE firm PartnerOne paid $28M for HeadSpin, a fraction of its $1.1B valuation set by ICONIQ and Dell Technologies Capital
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description:
Canadian private equity firm PartnerOne paid $28.2 million for HeadSpin, a mobile app testing startup whose founder was sentenced for fraud earlier this year, according to documents viewed by TechCrunch. The fire sale was reported by TechCrunch last week. HeadSpin’s 2023 revenue was $21 million and its Q1 2024 revenue stood at $5 million, the […]

item.title: Meta puts a halt to training its generative AI tools in Brazil
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description:
Meta has suspended the use of its AI assistant after Brazil’s National Data Protection Authority (ANPD) banned the company from training its AI models on personal data from Brazilians. The move puts a dent in Facebook’s attempt to build out its AI products in Brazil, a market with more than 200 million people. As cited […]
